Hello, 
My product Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G has the above problem:

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello Karim, You'll find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below: How to package your item: • The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product positioned so it won't move during transit. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside for identification in case the original label is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both inside and out before sending. Dear Backcare,

We acknowledge your customer's concern regarding the absence of dual SIM functionality in the phone you purchased. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Regrettably, the product description did not accurately indicate this feature. To make amends for the inconvenience, we would like to offer you a compensation of 40 euros.

Regards,
